text: Althaus is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Dieter Althaus (born 1958), German politician, Minister-President of Thuringia *Johannes Althusius (1557–1638), also known as Johannes Althaus, German Calvinist philosopher and theologian *Marcella Althaus-Reid, Argentinian professor *Adolf Paul Johannes Althaus, theologian *Kenneth Althaus, U.S. Army, general during World War II *Ernst Freiherr von Althaus, one of the world's first flying aces *Urs Althaus, Swiss actor
title: Althaus
